ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It was only the evildoers who misguided us
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: No one but the sinners led us astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is none but those steeped in guilt who led us into this error,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Only the sinful ones made us go astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And none misled us but the guilty.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And none has brought us into error except the criminals."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And none but the guilty led us astray;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It was naught but the sinners that led us astray;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It was but the guilty who misled us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It was the evildoers who led us astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And none led us astray except the Culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No one led us astray except the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And our seducers were only those who were steeped in guilt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And none has brought us into error except the Mujrimun [Iblis (Satan) and those of human beings who commit crimes, murderers, polytheists, oppressors, etc.].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It was nothing but the evildoers who led us astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No one misled us except the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And no one misguided us except the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:99] And it was none other than the sinners, the devils or our predecessors, whose example we were following, that led us astray, from guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It was but the guilty) the idolaters who came before us and whom we emulated (who misled us) who turned us away from faith and obedience.
